<h3 id="X38093">X(38093) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(7), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2-5*(b+c)*a+4*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38093) = 5*X(2)+X(7) = 4*X(2)-X(9) = X(2)+2*X(142) = 13*X(2)-X(144) = 7*X(2)-X(6172) = 2*X(2)+X(6173) = 7*X(2)-4*X(6666) = 11*X(2)-5*X(18230) = 2*X(2)-5*X(20195) = 4*X(7)+5*X(9) = X(7)-10*X(142) = 13*X(7)+5*X(144) = 7*X(7)+5*X(6172) = 2*X(7)-5*X(6173) = 7*X(7)+20*X(6666) = X(9)+8*X(142) = 13*X(9)-4*X(144) = 7*X(9)-4*X(6172) = X(9)+2*X(6173) = 7*X(9)-16*X(6666) = 11*X(9)-20*X(18230) = X(9)-10*X(20195)</b>
<p>
This triangle has collinear vertices.</p>
<p>X(38093) lies on these lines: {2,7}, {30,38122}, {140,5735}, {381,5732}, {443,34701}, {516,3524}, {518,3921}, {519,38053}, {524,38186}, {528,15015}, {529,38206}, {547,31657}, {549,5805}, {551,2550}, {971,5055}, {1001,5010}, {1086,16676}, {1449,17278}, {1698,25557}, {2801,38104}, {2951,30308}, {3243,3679}, {3247,4859}, {3254,6174}, {3340,30312}, {3534,18482}, {3545,21151}, {3624,5880}, {3654,20330}, {3828,5542}, {3834,16832}, {3848,10177}, {3875,29575}, {3925,31146}, {4034,4869}, {4321,11237}, {4326,11238}, {4384,17297}, {4395,29602}, {4648,4909}, {4659,17264}, {4675,16670}, {4725,16833}, {4870,12560}, {4873,29627}, {4888,17337}, {4902,16814}, {4971,29573}, {5054,21153}, {5066,31672}, {5131,28534}, {5223,19876}, {5308,17067}, {5436,11112}, {5528,10707}, {5564,17234}, {5698,19862}, {5759,15702}, {5762,11539}, {5779,15703}, {5843,38082}, {5845,38088}, {5850,38101}, {5851,38102}, {5852,38103}, {5853,38092}, {5856,38095}, {5857,38096}, {7988,15726}, {10012,31169}, {10582,31140}, {10956,38099}, {11523,17529}, {12625,37436}, {15254,34595}, {15570,34747}, {15693,31671}, {15694,31658}, {15699,38108}, {16831,17399}, {17132,36911}, {17237,31244}, {17265,17359}, {17284,34824}, {17298,17346}, {17307,28650}, {17384,31312}, {17504,38137}, {17605,30353}, {18065,30044}, {19877,30340}, {19878,30424}, {28313,29600}, {29598,36834}, {31434,38055}, {38030,38154}, {38031,38172}, {38037,38123}, {38041,38126}, {38054,38057}</p>
<p>
X(38093) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3524, 38073}, {3545, 21151}, {5054, 38107}, {5055, 38065}, {11539, 38080}, {15699, 38111}, {17504, 38137}, {19875, 38024}, {19883, 38094}, {21358, 38086}, {25055, 38052}<br>
X(38093) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21153, 5054), (38025, 19883), (38067, 11539), (38075, 5055), (38097, 19875), (38108, 15699)<br>
X(38093) = barycentric product X(8)*X(20121)<br>
X(38093) = trilinear product X(9)*X(20121)<br>
X(38093) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 142, 6173), (2, 5249, 31142), (2, 6172, 6666), (2, 6173, 9), (2, 27186, 31164), (2, 31164, 7308), (142, 20195, 9), (4675, 31183, 16670), (4859, 17245, 3247), (6173, 20195, 2), (38053, 38204, 38200), (38122, 38171, 38150)<br>
</p>
